nodes.title: Hello world!
nodes.excerpt: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

nodes.title: Life Is Beautiful
nodes.excerpt: Life Is Beautiful (Italian: La vita è bella, Italian pronunciation: [la ˈviːta ˈɛ bˈbɛlla]) is a 1997 Italian comedy-drama film directed by and starring Roberto Benigni, who co-wrote the film with Vincenzo Cerami. Benigni plays Guido Orefice, a Jewish Italian bookshop owner, who employs his fertile imagination to shield his son from the horrors of internment in a Nazi concentration camp. The film was partially inspired […]
